rows.label: qst300101_msg001
rows.name:
You're here. I have something
I'd like to discuss.

rows.label: qst300101_msg002
rows.name:
The number of requests coming to the
Merc Group has been increasing lately,
so I'm thinking of expanding our scale.

rows.label: qst300101_msg003
rows.name:
But to grow bigger, we're
short on supplies.

rows.label: qst300101_msg004
rows.name:
For expeditions, we need rations,
medicine, weapon maintenance
tools, and camping equipment...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300101_msg005
rows.name:
The list is endless...[ML:Dash ] Anyway, we
need a lot of things, so I'd like
you to help us gather them.

rows.label: qst300101_msg006
rows.name:
If we have more supplies, we can
assign missions to the members
who are currently on standby.

rows.label: qst300101_msg007
rows.name:
I'd like you to ask Zuo for the
details. He should be waiting
in front of the warehouse.

rows.label: qst300101_msg101
rows.name:
As for what to gather, I'd
like you to ask Zuo, who is
in front of the warehouse.

rows.label: qst300101_msg203
rows.name: I heard you were a great help!

rows.label: qst300101_msg204
rows.name:
You did well against that
large group. You really
helped us out. Thank you!

rows.label: qst300101_msg205
rows.name:
Gathering that many rations
must have been tough, right?
Everyone was delighted!

rows.label: qst300101_msg206
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]Now that we're running the
Merc Group on our own, I've
finally realized something.

rows.label: qst300101_msg207
rows.name:
We were completely reliant
on Vandham-san...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300101_msg209
rows.name:
Oh, sorry. This conversation
has gotten a bit gloomy...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300101_msg210
rows.name:
Anyway, with this, the Hr√¶svelgr
Merc Group will grow even bigger.

rows.label: qst300101_msg211
rows.name:
We'll keep up this pace so
that Vandham-san can rest
easy. We'll do our best!

rows.label: qst300101_msg212
rows.name:
If anything else comes up, I'd
like to ask for your help again.
We're counting on you!
